2011 - Communication Arts - webpick of the day Creative Developer Hello Design September 2011  –  April 2012  (8 months) Culver City, California Hello Design, what a pursuit, I remember back in the day, I saw Adhemas portfolio with crazy work and I thought, -"Dude, this place would be cool to work!". Fuck yeah, after mad years put in some agencies in Brazil and NYC, I finally moved to my dream, Los Angeles. 
 
At Hello Design, I had the opportunity to work with Simple Human, in a project that encompasses Flash and HTML as mobile version. Luckily we got some mentions with this website. 
 
But what I loved the most at my time at Hello Design, was the opportunity of being interviewed by FWA, everyone knows how big it is and how exposed your name will get once you pop an interview there.

2011 - Communication Arts - webpick of the day Senior Flash Developer Syrup December 2009  –  August 2011  (1 year 9 months) New York Syrup, oh Syrup. Me and Syrup was a case of love. It was my first experience in US of A and it was awesome. 
I had the opportunity to work with super creative dudes, I could put names here, but I would spend several lines of text, because I just loved my team there.  
 
My first task was with Puma, we created the Museum of Power campaign microsite and guess what? We won a Cyber Lion at Cannes Festival. For me was one of the greatest achievements in my career and I'm so thankful to Syrup team for that. 
 
On top of it, I had a bunch of others tasks, of course. Loads of Puma projects which won several others awards and mentions. 
 
The client list was: Puma, Speedo, Calvin Klein, Marc Jacobs, Ralph Lauren, Harajuku Lovers, Bottega Veneta among others
